revised_title: Spectroscopic Identification and Manometric Measurement of Artificially Produced Helium
tldr: The authors conducted experiments to produce and identify artificially produced helium through neutron bombardment of lithium and boron. They used a manometric measurement method and spectroscopic analysis to confirm the presence of helium and determine its purity. This research contributed to the understanding of nuclear physics and the development of new methods for producing artificial elements.
